items.headline: Chipotle’s outlook for the year casts doubt on a restaurant-industry rebound
items.summary_en: Shares of Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc. fell sharply after hours on Tuesday, after the fast-casual Mexican chain’s same-store outlook came in below expectations, and the company outlined steps it planned to take to regain growth.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Super Micro logs record revenue from AI demand, and the stock surges
items.summary_en: Super Micro’s revenue exploded to $12.7 billion as delayed orders finally materialized, but aggressive competition and rising costs pushed gross margins to a razor-thin 6.3%
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Oracle’s monster $25 billion debt financing points to anxieties around AI funding
items.summary_en: Oracle plans to raise up to another $25 billion this year but said the sales would be either equity or equity-linked issuances.
